name: Boots of Dancing
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity nicely.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users magical resistance adequately.
It increases the users acid resistance adequately.
It decreases the users fire resistance adequately.
The boots aid in dancing skills.
The boots alter the user's resistances somehow.
